verses.verse: O sing <WH7891> unto the Lord <WH3068> a new <WH2319> song <WH7892>; for he has done <WH6213> marvelous things <WH6381>: his right hand <WH3225>, and his holy <WH6944> arm <WH2220>, has gotten him the victory <WH3467>.
The Lord <WH3068> has made known <WH3045> his salvation <WH3444>: his righteousness <WH6666> has he openly shown <WH1540> in the sight <WH5869> of the heathen <WH1471>.

He has remembered <WH2142> his mercy <WH2617> and his truth <WH530> toward the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>: all the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776> have seen <WH7200> the salvation <WH3444> of our God <WH430>.
Make a joyful noise <WH7321> unto the Lord <WH3068>, all the earth <WH776>: make a loud noise <WH6476>, and rejoice <WH7442>, and sing praise <WH2167>.
Sing <WH2167> unto the Lord <WH3068> with the harp <WH3658>; with the harp <WH3658>, and the voice <WH6963> of a psalm <WH2172>.
With trumpets <WH2689> and sound <WH6963> of cornet <WH7782> make a joyful noise <WH7321> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>, the King <WH4428>.
Let the sea <WH3220> roar <WH7481>, and the fullness <WH4393> there <WH8398>; the world, and they that live in it <WH3427>.
Let the floods <WH5104> clap <WH4222> their hands <WH3709>: let the hills <WH2022> be joyful <WH7442> together <WH3162>

Before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>; for he comes <WH935> to judge <WH8199> the earth <WH776>: with righteousness <WH6664> shall he judge <WH8199> the world <WH8398>, and the people <WH5971> with equity <WH4339>.
